quotes.quote: Life is too short to have anything but delusional notions about yourself.
The delusional is no longer marginal.
All are lunatics, but he who can analyze his delusions is called a philosopher.
Delusional people tend to believe in what they're doing.
No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities.
There's a certain delusional quality that all successful people have to have.
Delusion detests focus and romance provides the veil.
The end of an delusion is invariably sadness or tears
Today's truth will be tomorrow's lie and you will be left questioning your own sanity.
Getting rid of a delusion makes us wiser than getting hold of a truth.
It is a common delusion that you make things better by talking about them.
No delusion is greater than the notion that method and industry can make up for lack of mother-wit, either in science or in practical life.
The worst deluded are the self-deluded.
Let no man in the world live in delusion. Without a Guru none can cross over to the other shore.
It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.
The fundamental delusion of humanity is to suppose that I am here and you are out there
Delusion arises from anger. The mind is bewildered by delusion. Reasoning is destroyed when the mind is bewildered. One falls down when reasoning is destroyed.
Self-delusion is pulling in your stomach when you step on the scales
A delusion is something that people believe in despite a total lack of evidence.
The people never give up their liberties but under some delusion.
The great thing about a culture of givers is that's not a delusion - it's reality.
The delusion of entertainment is devoid of meaning. It may amuse us for a bit, but after the initial hit we are left with the dark feeling of desolation.
One of the greatest delusions in the world is the hope that the evils in this world are to be cured by legislation.
I'm so incredibly tired of giving respect to a lot of delusions and crazy ideas just because they are regarded as religions.
The disappointment of manhood succeeds the delusion of youth.
The house of delusions is cheap to build but drafty to live in.
A dream with courage is innovation...A dream without courage is a delusion
Delusions, carefully implanted, are difficult to correct.
No one who shares a delusion ever recognizes it as such.
Artists are not in delusion, they only recreate the hidden side
The only thing that makes life unfair is the delusion that it should be fair.
Reality is a hallucination shared by most sane men.
We live and we die and anything else is just a delusion.
Sin is the delusion of our feelings; while crime is the delusion of our actions.
The possibility of truth has become a delusion to those who made their own disguise the truth.
